title: Ping issue
body:
Getting straight to the point, I'm getting constant ping issues every single game now and it's been getting worse. I don't wanna let my team down by constantly freezng up and iceskating all over the place only to end up dead. Live in Australia, shud be getting avg 40 ping but instead 100 above
plz halp!

Been atleast 3 months now and been getting worse, been contacted with riot mod's but their e-mails dont seem to be working, w/e i send something to them, a failed email gets back to me saying some error has occured blah blah blah... yeh that problem happens to me.

replies.body:
That font... is that what it looks like on Macs?

Anyway, if you are unable **send an e-mail**, something that is completely unrelated to League, you might have more underlying problems with your connection. Exactly how are you connected to the net and who's your ISP?

Are you in an area that's officially covered by their network? I know that Optus mainly focuses on the metropolitan. And if that's the case, could you try testing this out with another game/application? I basically want to identify exactly where the problem is, and going from your computer outwards is probably the best method.

On that note, do you have any other applications running while playing League?

on other multiplayer games which have servers in Australia round Sydney or somewhere close, I get an avg ping of bout 40-55
oh and no, I usually turn off other applications(also some background applications tht don't rly need to use) while playing. 


QQ got into low priority que as well XD

Oh man, that sounds bad. You might want to avoid playing PvP games until this is fixed.

Perform a [network test](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and analyse the results, it will tell you a lot about your connection. Message back to me about anything that appears in red. Don't post the entire results.

> [{quoted}](name=Rownin,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hmF4zKf9,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-11T10:34:01.802+0000)
>
> Getting straight to the point, I'm getting constant ping issues every single game now and it's been getting worse. I don't wanna let my team down by constantly freezng up and iceskating all over the place only to end up dead. Live in Australia, shud be getting avg 40 ping but instead 100 above
> plz halp!
> 
> Been atleast 3 months now and been getting worse, been contacted with riot mod's but their e-mails dont seem to be working, w/e i send something to them, a failed email gets back to me saying some error has occured blah blah blah... yeh that problem happens to me.


kalista is the worst champ to play when u lag. lol. Good LUck :)
ahaha yeh XD, i shoulda went jungle instead lel

shoulda probably covered up their names but it doesnt matter anymore, im fed up an can't get a decent non laggy game QQ, had lost soooooooo many games and its not even funny anymore. I used to be on winning sprees like u until I took a MASSIVE LAGG OUTTA NOWHERE FOR THE PAST 3 MONTHS! 
don't take it personal riot but I'm just .... at having to enter a game thinking " oh maybe theres no lagg today I hope" but nope, every game has been super laggy, I've tried many times to send my internet lol diagnostics to riottoxichawk@riotgames.com as suggested by a moderator in my old discussions on the matter but I can't get anything through! i get a reply saying an error has occured, or email doesnt exist, or failed to send, pls tell me if tht email is correct or not
